IP_SYN_4_style_7:
[Indication]
Airway stent obstruction, TBM.
[Anesthesia]
General, Rigid.
[Description]
Therapeutic aspiration of purulent secretions performed. Tracheal Y-stent removed via rigid bronchoscopy. Cryotherapy applied to granulation tissue in bilateral mainstems. TBM collapse documented.
[Plan]
Stent holiday. Monitor symptoms.
